Text:
Your encodes are always great!

Thanks, and Merry Christmas/Happy Holidays!

Cheers!

WARNING: WATERMARKED! Every 10-15 min, there's crap onscreen advertizing some sleazy website--like all of vyto's shitty rips. 

Apparently the people who posted positive comments above didn't watch this yet.

Ah, the season of goodwill! Michael: Please learn the difference between a 'watermark' and a 'subtitle' - the 'encoded by vyto' is at the end of the SUBTITLE, which you can DISABLE in your media player. You've been told this before. Did you not wonder why it was just you? 

New Year's resolution, maybe?
No logos in the movie, whatsoever, But the seeding is slow,
